I’m Sai Kiran Sripada, a polyglot programmer, musicophile and not so talented gamer. I love writing code, participating in Hackathons, and contributing to Open Source projects.

I like to experiment and build cool things in my spare time.

I’m crazy passionate about my craft, always looking out for original ideas and new things.
